ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: help with mage
ygData.msgSnippet: I like Sol A to 30 or 31, then Sol B to 60 for my chars.  I never did get tired of Sol B... I wish my 61 monk could still get exp there : Quwi ...
ygData.messageBody:
I like Sol A to 30 or 31, then Sol B to 60 for my
chars. I never did get tired of Sol B... I wish my 61
monk could still get exp there :\

Quwi
--- Yagermeister <odd_yager@...> wrote:
>
> > Watch out for the Wizard Gobs. They are pretty
> mean.
>
>
>
> By the way, also keep in mind these mobs are fairly
> resistant to fire
> so your dd spells may not do as much damage (if they
> even get
> through) but nevertheless, they have a lot lower HPs
> than the average
> expansion mob of the similar levels.
>
> I'm pretty sure there's a site out there that has XP
> bonus
> percentages for several dungeons so you can check it
> if youre bored
> with Solusek.
>
>
